mapper.update:
update loan
debitid = #{debitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
de_kind = #{deKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

pushstatus = #{pushstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update loan set debitid = #{debitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, de_kind = #{deKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, de_time = #{deTime,jdbcType=DATE}, de_amount = #{deAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_deadline = #{crDeadline,jdbcType=DATE}, cr_amount = #{crAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, de_repayed = #{deRepayed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, now(), isoverdue = #{isoverdue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pushstatus = #{pushstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
